sourcesContent:
// One.js

import React from 'react';
import { Container, Typography, Button, Card, CardContent, Grid, TextField } from '@mui/material';
import './one.css';

const One = () => {
  return (
    <Container className="one-container">
      <header>
        <Typography variant="h4">Action Research Studies: Instructional Strategies</Typography>
        <Typography variant="subtitle1">Uncovering impactful student-centered instructional methods and diverse learning strategies</Typography>
      </header>

      <section>
        <Typography paragraph>
          To uncover the most impactful student-centered instructional methods and diverse learning strategies, action research was undertaken to explore teacher perspectives. This investigation aimed to identify the most effective tools and resources assisting educators in crafting inclusive, research-based lesson plans that prioritize student engagement.
        </Typography>

        <Typography paragraph>
          For an insightful presentation of these findings, watch the Canva Video Presentation titled "Cultural Diversity."
        </Typography>

        <iframe
          title="Canva Video Presentation"
          width="100%"
          height="400"
          src="https://www.canva.com/design/DAF1wj4fUqo/73VP3AthaztrTP5OlQzKvw/watch?utm_content=DAF1wj4fUqo&utm_campaign=share_your_design&utm_medium=link&utm_source=shareyourdesignpanel"
          allowFullScreen
        />
      </section>

      <section className="summary-section">
        <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
          Research Findings Summary
        </Typography>
        <Typography paragraph>
          The research findings indicate a strong correlation between student engagement and the implementation of student-centered instructional methods. The Universal Design for Learning strategy emerged as a versatile approach, catering to diverse learning needs.
        </Typography>
        <Typography paragraph>
          Educators are encouraged to leverage the insights from this study to enhance their teaching practices and create inclusive, engaging learning environments.
        </Typography>
      </section>

      <section className="comments-section">
        <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
          User Comments
        </Typography>
        <TextField
          id="comment"
          label="Add your comment"
          multiline
          rows={4}
          fullWidth
          variant="outlined"
          margin="normal"
        />
        <Button variant="contained" color="primary" size="large">
          Post Comment
        </Button>
      </section>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default One;
